name: Corona Heroes Android Mobile
description:
We are young game developers who felt helpless during this terrible pandemic, so we are trying to help the only way our skills allow while living in isolation: creating a game. 

  This game is created only to raise money & awareness and celebrate the brave medical professionals on the front lines against this pandemic. We are releasing it for free and are not including any paid advertisements. However, at the end of the game we link to United Way's COVID-19 donation page.
